headline: AMD shows off new higher performing AI chip at CES event
summary: Advanced Micro Devices CEO Lisa Su showed off a number of the company's AI chips on Monday at the CES trade show in Las ‚ÄãVegas, including its advanced MI455 AI processors, which are components in the data center server racks that ‚Äåthe company is selling to firms like ChatGPT maker OpenAI.  Su also unveiled the MI440X, a version of the MI400 series chip designed for ‚Äåon-premise use at businesses.  The so-called enterprise version is designed to fit into infrastructure that is not specifically designed for AI clusters.

Su also unveiled the MI440X, a version of the MI400 series chip designed for ‚Äåon-premise use at businesses.  The so-called enterprise version is designed to fit into infrastructure that is not specifically designed for AI clusters.

headline: AMD shows off new higher performing AI chip at CES tech show
summary:
STORY: Advanced Micro Devices CEO Lisa Su took the stage in Las Vegas on Monday. 

Speaking at the annual Consumer Electronics Show, she showcased the company's latest AI hardware and held up new chips for the crowd to see.

"MI455 is the most advanced chip we've ever built. It's pretty darn big. It has 320 billion transistors, 70% more than MI355."  

These chips power data‚Äëcenter racks that AMD sells to firms like OpenAI.

The president of the ChatGPT-maker, Greg Brockman, joined Su on stage. 

He said chip advances were vital to OpenAI's vast needs for computing power. 

Su also had big claims for another platform: 

"So let me tell you what it is. This is the smallest AI development system in the world, capable of running models with up to 200 billion parameters locally not connected to anything."  

AMD remains Nvidia's top rival in AI chips, but trails in market share.

A recent deal with OpenAI has been seen as a show of confidence in the company.

:: NVIDIA

But analysts say it's unlikely to dent the dominance of Nvidia, which showed off its own new chips the same day. 

Boss Jensen Huang says they deliver a five-times boost in power for AI uses.

"So let me tell you what it is. This is the smallest AI development system in the world, capable of running models with up to 200 billion parameters locally not connected to anything."

Boss Jensen Huang says they deliver a five-times boost in power for AI uses.

headline: Nvidia's Rubin Chips on Track, CEO Huang Says
summary: Nvidia's highly anticipated Rubin data center processors are in production and customers will soon be able to try out the technology, according to Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang. Meanwhile, Advanced Micro Devices announced a new chip for corporate data center use and talked up the attributes of a future generation of products for that market. Bloomberg Intelligence's Masahiro Wakasugi breaks down the situation.

Bloomberg Intelligence's Masahiro Wakasugi breaks down the situation.

headline: A Look At Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) Valuation After CES 2026 AI And Data Center Announcements
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is back in the spotlight after its CES 2026 keynote, where CEO Lisa Su introduced new AI data center GPUs, the Helios rack platform, and Ryzen AI chips for PCs and embedded systems. See our latest analysis for Advanced Micro Devices. Those CES 2026 launches come after a period of mixed share price moves, with a 7 day share price return of 2.67% and a 90 day share price decline of 6.15%, yet a 1 year total shareholder return of 73.63% and a 3 year total shareholder...
